creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Add -Djavax.net.debug=all to jmeter properties
Run the attached Test case, you will notice HTTPs handshake is executed twice per Thread for first sample
To notice it, search for:
trustStore is: /System/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/1.6.0.jdk/Contents/Home/lib/security/cacerts



HC31Impl does not have this issue.
Analyzing further, issue does not exist in HC4 , so it's in JMeter

Created attachment 30393
Test Plan showing issue

With attached test plan, handshake is present 6 times for HC4
and only 2 times for HC3.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text: Issue is due to our custom HTTPS_SCHEME created between lines 192 and 208 in HTTPHC4Impl
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
